style.color: function(feature) { var strain = feature.get('strain'); if (strain=='CB4858' || strain=='AF16') {return 'blue';} else if (strain=='CB4856' || strain=='HK104') {return 'yellow';} else {return 'white';} }

metadata.shortInfo: This track shows single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs). In this track, the molecular nature of the polymorphism is indicated by its glyph: Boxes are deletions; triangles are insertions; point mutations and substitutions are diamonds. Color reflects the source strain: polymorphisms found in CB4858 (Pasadena) are shown in blue; those found in CB4856 (Hawaii) in yellow, and all others in white.
